item.title: Special Bars only on items with special
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

Can someone help me figure out how to only have special bars on certain items. I know that not all servers have special bars, so it must be in my client.java. I would rather have to add special bar to all weapons with special attacks, rather than take them away from the ones that don’t; although I will do either one. I use project czar source, if that makes a difference. Anyways, it is very much appreciated if you help me figure this out.

P.S. (Knowledge already learned)

  • I found this code on my server. Think it might have something to do with it.

[code]public void frame70(int i1, int i2, int i3) //

interface thing, not sure
{
outStream.createFrame(70); // THIS FRAME IS FOR

SPECIAL ATTACK BAR MOFOS!
outStream.writeWord(i1); // offset X
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i2); // offset Y
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i3); // interface,

definatly.
sendMessage(“Frame 70 tested”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public void framevar70(int i1, int i2, int i3) // no

idea
{
outStream.createFrameVarSize(70);
outStream.writeWord(i1);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i2);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i3);
sendMessage(“Framevar 70 tested”);
}[/code]

Read full topic
